Content.Text:
<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, I guess I should head ho--

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
O-oh. It's you, <MYNAME>. What were you
doing, standing there like that? You startled me!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You tried to catch my attention, but I
didn't notice, so you just waited for me to spot
you?
<PAGE>
Oh. I'm sorry I didn't hear you. I get this kind of
tunnel vision when I study sometimes.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What am I doing? What I just said, of course. I
was studying this flower blooming here.
<PAGE>
Of all the flowers nearby, this one alone has
differently shaped petals. Some sudden
mutation, maybe? If so, how?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, my turn to ask you: What were you doing?
If you were waiting for me, you must need
something, right?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You just wanted to say hi? That's the only
reason you waited that long for me to notice
you?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L>He he. Really? You are certainly an interesting
one, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now we've officially exchanged our pleasantries.
Thank you for waiting.
<PAGE>
If you have no other business with me, I'd like to
return home and write up my report on my
findings.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks. If you'll pardon me, then. See you later.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What did you do that for, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You said hi to me, but I didn't notice, so
you thought to get my attention? Well...sorry for
not noticing you, then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>However, I'm very busy with my studies of this
plant right now. I'll thank you to leave me in
peace.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Sheesh. What was that all about?
